record.description: Here are a half-dozen of the best co-ed tapsters at the University of Chicago, who won places in the tap-dance chorus of the 1933 Mirror Revue. Mirror, the student dramatic association on the campus, is promising a better and more up-to-date show than has been brought to the campus for many years. Rehearsing for opening night, March 3, left to right: Margaret Holahan, Lorraine Watson, Peggy Moore, Virginia Russell, Margaretha Moore, and Betty Cason.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
